scripts.postinstall: npm run build:back-end && npm run build:front-end && npm run build: database
scripts.build:back-end: npm run install:back-end && npm run build --prefix back-end
scripts.install:back-end: npm install --prefix back-end && npm install --prefix back-end --only=dev
scripts.build:front-end: npm run install:front-end && npm run build --prefix front-end
scripts.install:front-end: npm install --prefix front-end && npm install --prefix front-end --only=dev
scripts.build:database: npm run install:database && npm run build --prefix database
